allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Version 2.4.5: Add calendar view for ad play history

- Added interactive calendar feature to Ad Statistics window
- Calendar displays days with ad plays using dot indicators
  * Up to 5 dots show individual plays \(●●●●●\)
  * 5+ plays show dot with count \(●5\)
- Month navigation with < > buttons
- Click days to see specific play times in 12-hour format
- Efficient caching of daily/hourly stats
- Larger calendar cells for better visibility
- Test data creation script for calendar feature

Co-Authored-By: Claude Haiku 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
